extendedInfo.description: Get the latest world and regional news from all the major networks and newspapers all in one place. From breaking news, to business, politics, entertainment, technology, the arts and sport.Watch video reports,one-on-one interviews, comment and share stories on Facebook and read the latest updates wherever you are.Key features include:â¢ Simple, clutter-free design.â¢ Post stories to social networks, or share with friendsâ¢ Comment on stories that matter to youâ¢ Watch videos of breaking news.â¢ Scroll through hundreds of photosâ¢ Read stories from influential newspapers: LA times, NY times, Washington Post, USA today.â¢ Watch and read news from all the major networks:CNN,BBC, ABC,NBC,AlJazeera e.t.c-Get an unbiased point of view.
